component.name: MainMenuListPanel
component.script:
sub init() m.top.list = m.top.findNode("menulist") title = m.top.findNode("appTitle") title.text = tr("appTitle") title.translation = [(1280 - title.boundingRect().width) / 2, 100]
centerx = (1280 - 250) / 2 centery = (720 - 200) / 2 m.top.list.translation = [ centerx, centery ] m.top.list.setFocus(true) end sub
